title: Understanding the Nursing Process
text: The nursing process is a systematic method used by nurses to ensure quality patient care. It involves several steps that guide nurses in making decisions and providing care.

title: Components of the Nursing Process
text: The nursing process typically includes assessment, diagnosis, planning, implementation, and evaluation. Each step is crucial in delivering effective mental health care.
